title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message:
No history. No liquid that I can see yet. This computer turns on, chimes, shows Apple logo then shuts down right away. 
Tried with two different batteries.
PPBUS is at 13V when charger is plugged in. 11.75V on battery. 
SMC issue??

Thanks guys.

title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message: PPBUS with just the charger no battery is 13 volts?

title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message: Disconnect everything and try a known good LCD. Or just swap the board in a complete known good chassis/LCD. Another SSD too of course.

title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message:
HI Sorry for the delayed response.
Upon further inspection there actually was a small bit of corrosion on the KB connector. It must have been shorting the power pins. Replaced it and its booting to OS again. But now I have no internal KB in system report. Nor do I have USB on the I/O board. Also missing Wifi, but I do have BT. Wierd. USB on Board works.

TP Works. Have a replaced U4820 because the corroded pins on the KB connector led to it.

title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message: Is this with a known good KB and IO board?

title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message:
Tried with new KB. IO is original.

Update - Tried with new IO board and wifi and usb is good now.
Tried board in a different shell with known working KB. Still nothing. In System Report under SPI it shows "Internal Apple Keyboard" (sorry I was mistaken when I said it wasn't showing in the previous post, I was looking under USB for it. My bad.)  I have pp3v42 on pin 4 and 3v3 on pin 30 but still KB is not working. Only power button. 

Thanks Guys, have a good one.

title: [SOLVED] 820-4924 Turns on then off right away
message: This has been resolved. Thank you.
